text: Ian Appelbaum is an American physicist, currently at the University of Maryland and an Elected Fellow of the American Physical Society. He is a graduate of Massachusetts Institute of Technology with a Ph.D. in physics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology alumni Category:Fellows of the American Physical Society Category:21st-century American physicists Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Ian Appelbaum
